definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Morale is so low right now.
sentences.chinese: 现在大家的斗志也很低。

sentences.english: The army paralyzed the enemy's fighting will.
sentences.chinese: 部队瓦解了敌军的斗志。

sentences.english: One hope will raise our sprits.
sentences.chinese: 一个希望可以鼓舞斗志。

sentences.english: There is nothing more demoralizing than a small but adequate income. - E. Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么比一份不多不少的收入更消磨人的斗志了。

sentences.english: This can have a disastrous effect on morale and productivity.
sentences.chinese: 这可能对员工的斗志和生产力产生巨大影响。

sentences.english: Answer them by recommitting with energy and determination to our work.
sentences.chinese: 请用充满斗志和决心的工作来回答他们。

sentences.english: We have got to make sure we show it in the next game.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须要在下场比赛中体现出这种斗志。

sentences.english: This can paralyse the enemy's fighting will.
sentences.chinese: 这可能瓦解敌军的斗志。

sentences.english: O' Neal 's success can only spur the hypercompetitive Bryant.
sentences.chinese: 奥尼尔的成功只能激励着科比的斗志。

sentences.english: There are some of us who keep up our morale by being always busy.
sentences.chinese: 我们当中有些人总是保持自己忙忙碌碌的斗志。

sentences.english: I saw that he's mature and full of will, " Maradona said.
sentences.chinese: 我能看到他的成熟和斗志昂扬，”马拉多纳说。

sentences.english: It has eroded the nation’s morale and sapped its economic strength.
sentences.chinese: 它已侵蚀了国家的斗志并榨干了国家的经济实力。

sentences.english: She continued to work in a blithe spirit in spite of all difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 她不管多么艰难继续斗志昂扬地工作。

sentences.english: Miu Miu is full of optimism about the fight, is a small office like his reasons.
sentences.chinese: 妙妙充满斗志又乐观，是小任喜欢他的原因。

sentences.english: But the truest victory, my son C is stirring the hearts of your people…
sentences.chinese: 但，真正的胜利，是鼓舞你的子民心中的斗志。

sentences.english: Does the experience of boredom make you unmotivated and unexcited?
sentences.chinese: 厌倦的情绪是否使你激情和斗志全无？
